name: HolidayMagicRadio
0:
”Alexa, open Holiday Magic Radio”
”Alexa, play Holiday Magic Radio”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: holiday magic radio
Developer Terms of Use
des:
"Holiday Magic Radio" is your all-access pass to the enchanting world of Christmas music and merriment!
Step into a winter wonderland of melodies that will warm your heart and transport you to the coziest corners of the holiday season. 
From classic carols that evoke cherished memories to contemporary hits that add a modern twist to the festivities, we've curated the perfect soundtrack for your yuletide celebrations. 
Join us for a musical sleigh ride filled with the spirit of giving, the joy of togetherness, and the magic of the season. Tune in and let "Holiday Magic Radio" make your holidays even more special! Visit is at fmmradio.com for more.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
